word_mean_info__list.difference: 与receive同意，是receive的日常用法，侧重不带主观意愿地收下或接受。
强调主动地或自愿地接受，或者说，经过考虑后同意接受。
作“接受”讲时，强调准许或批准。
着重仅仅接到或收到这一支轮船或事实，而不含采取主动或积极行动的意思。

bilingual.source: Open a present immediately when you receive it.
We sincerely hope to receive your feedback.
bilingual.target: 我们真诚地希望收到您的反馈。

bilingual.source: Then you receive it a few days later by post.
bilingual.target: 然后你几天后通过邮寄收到它。

bilingual.source: You pay for online shopping before you receive it.
bilingual.target: 你在收到网上购物的商品之前付款。

bilingual.source: You will be able to receive it anywhere in the world.
bilingual.target: 你可以在世界任何地方收到它。

bilingual.source: Can you open a gift immediately after you receive it in England?
bilingual.target: 你在英国收到礼物后能立即打开吗？

list.abstract: receive（英[rɪˈsiːv]，美[rɪˈsiːv]），英语单词，动词，意思为收到；接到；遭受。短语搭配有receive treatment（接受治疗），例句为“I'm glad to receive your email.（很高兴收到你的邮件。）” receive及物动词类近义词有acknowledge receipt of、to hand，不及物动词类近义词有take over，反义词为say farewell，过去分词为received。
《爱与诚》是Alanis Morissette发行的专辑《Havoc and Bright Light》中的一首歌曲，发行于2012 年9 月 3 日。

yingyinNormal.en: How could you receive a message if no one could find you? Sounds suspicious to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果没人找得到你，你是怎么收到消息的？太可疑了。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen Bing, I received your memo. So, we're not gonna receive the systems report until next Friday?
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，备忘录我收到了，我们下周五才能看到系统报告吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Uh-oh. Uh-oh is right! Our enemy, the Gorg, will receive it, and can use directions for to find us! The Gorg?
yingyinNormal.zh: 哎呀。哎呀个鬼啊！我们的敌人，格尔族也会收到的，他们能通过坐标找到我们！格尔族？！

yingyinNormal.en: So, will August Pullman please come up here to receive this award?
yingyinNormal.zh: 下面，请奥吉斯特·普尔曼同学上台接受这一奖项。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh for heaven's sake, are we to receive every Bennet in the country?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，乡下所有叫班纳特都来我们家了？

yingyinNormal.en: Report to work Monday morning. And you will receive a salary and a pension.
yingyinNormal.zh: 周一早上你去上班报到就会领薪水和年金了。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: If and when Peeta is liberated, he will receive a full and unconditional pardon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦皮塔被释放，他将获得无条件豁免权。

yingyinNormal.en: I will be writing to your families tonight, and you will both receive detention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天晚上我就写信通知你们的家人,还要罚你们两个劳动服务。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: The executive can't legislate, can't receive appropriations, can't sentence people to imprisonment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 行政机关不能立法，不能接受拨款，不能判人入监。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll receive it now from Negative Assets. This gentleman. The last man in. Negative Assets. What's that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们需要底片，要找底片资产主管。

yingyinNormal.en: And if either continues, the feds are going to investigate and revoke your eligibility to receive funding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论哪个案子继续下去，你们都会被联邦调查局调查，并被撤销集资资格。

yingyinNormal.en: Therefore, it is only fitting that you both receive Special Awards for Services to the School. Thanks, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的所作所为也足以让你们得到霍格沃茨的特殊贡献奖。谢谢你，校长。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: And through this having and giving and sharing and receiving. We too can share and love and have and receive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 借着这样的拥有和付出、以及分享接受、我们同样分享，爱，和拥有还有接受。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, it's just that in all the years I've known him, he's never had the opportunity to receive my admiration.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只是这是我认识他的这些年来，他从未有过机会得到我的赞赏。

yingyinNormal.en: It does not grant citizenship, or the right to stay here permanently or offer the same benefits that citizens receive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它不涉及授予国籍，给予永久在此的权力，或者提供正式公民拥有的相同的福利。

yingyinNormal.en: New screening measures are now in place at airports that receive nearly all passengers arriving from Liberia, Guinea and Sierra Leone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 新的筛查措施已经在所有来自利比里亚几内亚，塞拉利昂乘客的机场实施。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, God, for the food we are about to receive and for the nourishment of our bodies and bless the hands that prepared it. A men.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢主，赐给我们桌上的美食，食物给我们身体补充营养，保佑准备这些食物的人。阿门。

yingyinNormal.en: You may have made that call from the train, but I would never receive it here. It's a different reality, Captain. If the call even went through it would be received by a different me entirely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可能在火车上给我打了电话但我在这收不到，这是不同的世界，上尉。就算电话接通了，接电话的也是一个完全不同的我。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 接受; 接收; 收到; 得到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

v. 收到；接收；遭受，经受；接待；（receive的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 收到；接到；遭受；经受；接待；接见；欢迎；接受；接纳；承受

sense_info_list.zh: 接受; 接收; 收到; 得到

examination_example.sentence: As it turns out, many people are actually perfectly willing to talk—and may even be flattered to <highlight>receive</highlight> your attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，许多人实际上非常愿意交谈——甚至可能会因为得到你的关注而受宠若惊。

examination_example.sentence: Global challenges and social innovation ought to <highlight>receive</highlight> much more attention from scientists, especially the young ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球挑战和社会创新应该受到科学家更多的关注，尤其是年轻科学家。

examination_example.sentence: Once a discovery claim becomes public, the discoverer <highlight>receives</highlight> intellectual credit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦发现声明被公开，发现者就会收到知识上的荣誉。

sense_info_list.en: suffer, experience, or be subject to specified treatment

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays homework is <highlight>receiving</highlight> more criticism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今家庭作业正遭受到越来越多的批评。

sense_info_list.en: greet or welcome a visitor formally
form an idea or impression as a result of perception or experience

word_usage.usage: 表示“收到；接受”时，accept指主观上接受或同意建议、邀请等，也指认为某人或某物足够好而接受。receive指收到信件、消息、礼物等，表示客观上接收这一行为，不涉及接收者的主观意愿，也指接受医院的治疗。take泛指接受或收到某人给的东西、提议等。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“察觉、感到、发觉、理解”。
只表示“收取”、“收到”别人给的东西，或别人所说、所写的东西。它可以包含或不包含对收到的东西的“赞同”或“认可”。
主要指“愿意或喜欢接受”，但有时也指“承认”而不是明确的“同意”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Halfway through the trip, we <highlight>received</highlight> news that a hurricane was approaching.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 旅行中途，我们收到消息说飓风要来了。

examination_example.sentence: However, the ambitious scientist <highlight>received</highlight> negligible support from the government.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这位雄心勃勃的科学家从政府那里得到的支持微不足道。

examination_example.sentence: I think sometimes people need to shift their mindsets around how they <highlight>receive</highlight> feedback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我认为，有时人们需要改变他们接受反馈的心态。

sense_info_list.en: suffer, experience, or be subject to specified treatment

examination_example.sentence: They have <highlight>received</highlight> unfair treatment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们受到了不公平的待遇。

word_usage.usage:
receive 是非延续性动词，不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。如：
我收到你的信已两三天了。
误 I've received your letter for a couple of days.
正 I've received your letter a couple of days ago.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
receive 是非延续性动词，不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。如：
我收到你的信已两三天了。
误 I've received your letter for a couple of days.
正 I've received your letter a couple of days ago.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Practically everyone can make and <highlight>receive</highlight> calls anywhere, anytime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几乎每个人都可以随时随地拨打和接听电话。

examination_example.sentence: The day the post went live, Pruitt <highlight>received</highlight> thirty used bicycles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 帖子发布的当天，Pruitt收到了30辆二手自行车。

examination_example.sentence: Similarly, if you speak only Chinese, <highlight>receiving</highlight> a card in Swedish takes part of the fun away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，如果你只会说中文，收到一张瑞典语的卡片会让你失去一部分乐趣。

examination_example.sentence: The procedure was <highlight>received</highlight> among the staff with enthusiasm.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个程序受到了员工们的热情欢迎。

examination_example.sentence: Jenifer <highlight>received</highlight> great support from her family as she worked to earn her degree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 詹妮弗在努力获得学位的过程中受到了家人的大力支持。

examination_example.sentence: Wednesday, residents (居民) of Rjukan <highlight>received</highlight> their very first ray of winter sunshine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周三，Rjukan的居民体验到了冬天的第一缕阳光。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Receive</highlight> a guest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 招待一个客人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 收到；接到；遭受；经受；接待；接见；欢迎；接受；接纳；承受

examination_example.sentence: It is much better to give than to <highlight>receive</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 付出比得到好得多。

examination_example.sentence: With the help of the telescope, we can <highlight>receive</highlight> weaker and more radio messages far away in space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 借助望远镜，我们可以接收到遥远太空中更弱、更多的无线电信息。

examination_example.sentence: Then I realized that life is not built on the answers we <highlight>receive</highlight> but on the questions we ask.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来我意识到生活不是建立在我们得到的答案上，而是建立在我们提出的问题上。

sense_info_list.en: suffer, experience, or be subject to specified treatment

examination_example.sentence: With the help of her parents, Linda <highlight>received</highlight> speech and communication treatment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在父母的帮助下，琳达接受了言语和交流治疗。

examination_example.sentence: If they can't, they may have to pay as much as $1, 200 as a fine (罚款), or <highlight>receive</highlight> some other punishment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果他们做不到，他们可能要支付1200美元的罚款，或者遭受其他惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: The upper rims of the canyon often <highlight>receive</highlight> snowfall．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 峡谷的上缘经常下雪。

sense_info_list.en: greet or welcome a visitor formally

examination_example.sentence: People use top-grade tea to show respect when <highlight>receiving</highlight> important guests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们在接待重要客人时，用高档茶来表示尊重。

examination_example.sentence: How did the waiter <highlight>receive</highlight> the group of teens?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 服务员是如何接待那群青少年的？

examination_example.sentence: What kind of guests they <highlight>receive</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们接待了什么样的客人。

sense_info_list.en: form an idea or impression as a result of perception or experience

examination_example.sentence: Impressionism <highlight>received</highlight> its name from an early painting by Claude Monet titled impression, Sunrise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 印象派名字来自于克劳德·莫奈早期的一幅作品，名为印象·日出。

word_usage.usage:
receive 是非延续性动词，不能与表示一段时间的状语连用。如：
我收到你的信已两三天了。
误 I've received your letter for a couple of days.
正 I've received your letter a couple of days ago.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 强调主观上自愿地接受或同意建议、邀请等；也指认为某人或某物够好而接受。
侧重接到或收到某一事物，不含采取主动或积极行动的意思。
与receive同义，为receive的日常用法，侧重不带主观意愿地收下或接受。
